com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium

Class SeleniumWComponentsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.SeleniumWComponentsUtil

  • public final class SeleniumWComponentsUtil
extends Object

    Utility class containing convenience methods for testing WComponents with Selenium.

    Logic has been extracted into this utility class for any consumers who cannot extend WComponentSeleniumTestCase due to a different test class hierarchy.

    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Joshua Barclay, Mark Reeves, Jonathan Austin

      • waitForPageReady

        public static void waitForPageReady(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                    int timeoutSeconds,
                    long pollingMilliseconds)
        Wait for the page to have loaded, including all AJAX and JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        driver - the WebDriver.
        timeoutSeconds - - the number of seconds after which the 'wait' will time out.
        pollingMilliseconds - - the number of milliseconds to wait between each poll attempt.

        Is there an open dialog on the screen?
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • wrapInputElementWithTypedWebElement

        public static SeleniumWComponentInputWebElement wrapInputElementWithTypedWebElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                                                    org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Analyze the input element and attempt to wrap it in the appropriate component-specific subclass. If not component specific subclass can be identified then the element will be wrapped in a SeleniumWComponentWebElement.
        Parameters:
        driver - the WebDriver.
        element - the default Selenium WebElement.
        Returns:
        a subtype of SeleniumWComponentWebElement specific to the element type.
